artist: Larsen Design Studio; Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Various fabric samples all constructed using 'beige malachite' warp. Plain weave with beige warp and beige, off-white and gold weft, resulting in a slightly textured weave with subtle warp stripe effect. (beige, green, off-white, gold metallic)
title: Beige Malachite Warp - Development and Sampling
